name: Deathmatch (alpha)
description:
This game is in ALPHA state so IT WILL HAVE SEVERAL GLITCHES-BUGS-EXPLOITS. Please leave a comment if you experience any issues so i can fix them :D

Duel fast-paced shooter game.

Español: Este juego esta en fase Alpha,asi que VA A TENER GLITCHES-BUGS-EXPLOITS GRAVES. Por favor dejame un comentario si sufres algun problema,asi lo podre arreglar pronto :D

Shooter de duelos rapidos
